title: Host Name
desc: Sip2 server name. It MUST be a name if TLS is enabled. Otherwise an IP is ok, too.

title: Connection Timeout
desc: How many seconds until connection attempt will be aborted. Default 3 (if you set a higher value, it might automatically be reduced to the maximum the server supports).

title: TLS - allow selfsigned
desc: If TLS is enabled, allow selfsigned certificate from server?

title: Encoding
desc: Which encoding does the server use

title: Expert Setting (highly unlikely any adjustments are required)
Maximum Retries For Sending SIP2-Message
desc: Maximum number of resends allowed before we give up. Note: this is pretty much a relict from pre tcp times

title: Set CRC
desc: Toggle crc checking and appending for SIP2 messages.

title: Set Sequence Numbers
desc: Toggle the use of sequence numbers

title: Login Encryption Algorithm
desc: Login encryption algorithm type (0 = plain text)
